import React from 'react' import obj from './Data.js' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Watches = ({addtocart}) => { function addtocart(id){ console.log(id) } return (
{obj.watches.map((a, index) => (
{a.title}

{a.discription}

Rs:{a.price}
))}
) } export default Watches
